metaobject.name: Object
metaobject.is_a: a concept modelled by stateless anonymous types generated by the compiler which allow access to metadata reflecting specific program declarations

operation.name: reflects_same
operation.brief: indicates whether two metaobjects reflect the same base-level declaration ('entity').

operation.name: get_source_location
operation.brief: returns the source location info of the declaration of $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand).

operation.name: get_source_file_name
operation.brief: returns the source file name of the declaration of $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand).

operation.name: get_source_line
operation.brief: returns the source file line number of the declaration of $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand).

operation.name: get_source_column
operation.brief: returns the source file column number of the declaration of $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand).

metaobject.name: ObjectSequence
metaobject.label: Object\nSequence
metaobject.brief: is an ordered sequence of metaobjects.

operation.name: get_size
operation.brief: returns the number of elements in the sequence.

operation.name: get_element
operation.brief: returns the i-th $(result) in a $(operand).

operation.name: unpack_sequence
operation.brief: unpacks the $(operand) into a template.

operation.name: is_anonymous
operation.brief: indicates whether the $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand) is anonymous.

operation.name: get_base_name
operation.brief: returns the basic name of the $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand).

operation.name: get_display_name
operation.brief: returns the display name of the $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand).

operation.name: get_aliased
operation.brief: returns the $(result) reflecting the original declaration of $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand).

metaobject.name: Typed
metaobject.reflects: a base-level declaration with a type (for example a variable)

operation.name: get_type
operation.brief: returns the $(result) reflecting the type of $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand).

metaobject.name: ScopeMember
metaobject.reflects: a declaration nested in a scope (like the global scope, namespace, class, enum, etc.)

operation.name: get_scope
operation.brief: returns the $(result) reflecting the scope of $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand).

metaobject.name: RecordMember
metaobject.reflects: a class, struct or union member

operation.name: is_public
operation.brief: indicates whether the $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand) was declared with public access.

operation.name: is_protected
operation.brief: indicates whether the $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand) was declared with protected access.

operation.name: is_private
operation.brief: indicates whetherthe $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand) was declared with private access.

operation.name: is_inline
operation.brief: returns whether the $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand) was declared as inline.

operation.name: get_reflected_type
operation.brief: returns the the base-level type reflected by a $(operand).

operation.name: is_enum
operation.brief: indicates whether the $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand) is an enum.

operation.name: is_class
operation.brief: indicates whether the $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand) is a class.

operation.name: is_struct
operation.brief: indicates whether the $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand) is a struct.

operation.name: is_union
operation.brief: indicates whether the $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand) is a union.

metaobject.name: Record
metaobject.reflects: a class, a scope or a union

operation.name: get_data_members
operation.brief: returns a $(result) of $(elements) reflecting all (including private and protected) data members of $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand).

operation.name: get_public_data_members
operation.brief: returns a $(result) of $(elements) reflecting the public data members of $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand).

operation.name: get_accessible_data_members
operation.brief: returns a $(result) of $(elements) reflecting data members of $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand) accessible from the point of invocation of the reflection operator.

operation.name: get_member_types
operation.brief: returns a $(result) of $(elements) reflecting all (including private and protected) member types of $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand).

operation.name: get_public_member_types
operation.brief: returns a $(result) of $(elements) reflecting the public member types of $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand).

operation.name: get_accessible_member_types
operation.brief: returns a $(result) of $(elements) reflecting member types of $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand) accessible from the point of invocation of the reflection operator.

operation.name: is_final
operation.brief: returns whether the $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand) was declared as final.

operation.name: get_base_classes
operation.brief: returns a $(result) of $(elements) reflecting the inheritance of all base clases (including the private and protected ones) of a $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand).

operation.name: get_public_base_classes
operation.brief: returns a $(result) of $(elements) reflecting the inheritance of public base clases of a $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand).

operation.name: get_accessible_base_classes
operation.brief: returns a $(result) of $(elements) reflecting the inheritance of those base clases of a $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand) which are accessible from the point of invocation of the reflection operator.

operation.name: is_scoped_enum
operation.brief: returns true if the $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand) is scoped.

operation.name: get_enumerators
operation.brief: returns a $(result) of $(elements) reflecting all enumerators of $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand).

operation.name: get_constant
operation.brief: returns the value of $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand).

operation.name: is_constexpr
operation.brief: returns whether the $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand) was declared as constexpr.

operation.name: is_static
operation.brief: returns whether the $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand) was declared with the static specifier.

operation.name: get_pointer
operation.brief: returns a pointer to the $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand). If the variable is a class member then the pointer is a class data member pointer, otherwise it is a plain pointer.

operation.name: get_class
operation.brief: returns the $(operand) reflecting the base $(reflected) in a inheritance.

operation.name: is_virtual
operation.brief: returns whether the $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand) was declared as virtual.

operation.name: is_public
operation.brief: indicates whether the $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand) was declared as public.

operation.name: is_protected
operation.brief: indicates whether the $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand) was declared as protected.

operation.name: is_private
operation.brief: indicates whether the $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand) was declared as private.

operation.name: get_overloads
operation.brief: returns a $(result) of $(elements) reflecting all overloads in a overload set

operation.name: get_parameters
operation.brief: returns a $(result) of $(elements) reflecting the parameters of a callable

operation.name: is_constexpr
operation.brief: indicates whether the $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand) was declared as constexpr.

operation.name: is_noexcept
operation.brief: indicates whether the $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand) was declared as noexcept.

operation.name: is_inline
operation.brief: indicates whether the $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand) was declared as inline.

operation.name: is_static
operation.brief: indicates whether the $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand) was declared as static.

operation.name: is_const
operation.brief: indicates whether the $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand) was declared as const.

operation.name: is_volatile
operation.brief: indicates whether the $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand) was declared as volatile.

operation.name: is_virtual
operation.brief: indicates whether the $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand) was declared as virtual.

operation.name: is_pure_virtual
operation.brief: indicates whether the $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand) is pure virtual.

operation.name: is_override
operation.brief: indicates whether the $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand) is a virtual function override.

operation.name: get_captures
operation.brief: returns a $(result) of $(elements) reflecting the captured variables of $(reflected) reflected by a $(operand).

metaobject.name: FunctionParameter
metaobject.reflects: function, constructor, destructor or operator parameter
